p: Daily temperatures were obtained from the Meteorological Aviation Report (METAR) system, which reports data from an automated weather observing system (AWOS) weather station (METAR station identification number: VAAH 040710Z 01003KT 4000 DU FEW080 40/21 Q1006 NOSIG) located at Ahmedabad's Sardar Vallabai Patel International Airport. We collected hourly temperature data from 1 April to 30 June for 2007–2010 and 2014–15, respectively, and identified T max as the highest value in each daily sample downloaded from the web-based portal.
